other_tests.findings: The appendix is abnormally dilated with a proximal diameter of 14 mm and tapers to a diameter of 10 mm. There is extensive wall enhancement and surrounding fluid and phlegmonous change. A small periappendiceal fluid collection measures approximately 2.1 x 2.8 x 2.4 cm. Multiple small reactive lymph nodes are seen in the RLQ, along with a small amount of free fluid in the pelvis.
